name: Bean combat! (prototype)
description: Welcome to bean combat! Play multiplayer on the same computer with relatively crappy controls! The green bean on the right uses the h key to move left and k key to move right. You block with j while using the green bean. While the red bean uses d for right and a for left with s for guarding. Additionally the red bean has a special ability with w. While using red bean you press X to attack, while use it green bean press N to attack!
